sn35.158:4.1: “Cakkhuṃ, bhikkhave, yoniso manasi karotha, cakkhāniccatañca yathābhūtaṃ samanupassatha.
sn35.158:4.2: Cakkhuṃ, bhikkhave, bhikkhu yoniso manasikaronto, cakkhāniccatañca yathābhūtaṃ samanupassanto cakkhusmimpi nibbindati.
sn35.158:4.8: jivhaṃ, bhikkhave, yoniso manasi karotha, jivhāniccatañca yathābhūtaṃ samanupassatha.
sn35.158:4.9: Jivhaṃ, bhikkhave, bhikkhu yoniso manasikaronto, jivhāniccatañca yathābhūtaṃ samanupassanto jivhāyapi nibbindati.
sn35.158:4.14: manaṃ, bhikkhave, yoniso manasi karotha, manāniccatañca yathābhūtaṃ samanupassatha.
sn35.158:4.15: Manaṃ, bhikkhave, bhikkhu yoniso manasikaronto, manāniccatañca yathābhūtaṃ samanupassanto manasmimpi nibbindati.
